values: 盐；食盐；[化学]盐；盐类；（~s）盐状物；泄盐；<比喻>提神物；刺激物；风趣；趣味；<非正式>有经验的水手；（Salt）索尔特河（美国亚利桑那州中南部）
咸的；含盐的；盐腌的；用盐腌制的；有咸味的；含盐水的；用盐作调料的
用盐给…调味；在（食物）中放盐；用盐腌制；（为防结冰）撒盐于…上
（SALT）（美苏）限制战略武器会谈（Strategic Arms Limitation Talks的缩写）

synonym.mean: 咸水的；含盐的，咸味的；盐腌的；猥亵的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 加盐于；使…增添兴趣；用盐腌制（salt的过去分词）

word_group.brief_definition: 盐土草地；海岸盐沼；海岸盐碱滩
在某人伤口上擦盐；使某人痛上加痛

bilingual.source: Could you please pass me the salt?
Finally, don't forget to add some salt.
Finally, I don't forget to add some salt.
Foods with lots of salt can be unhealthy.
bilingual.target: 含盐多的食物可能不健康。

bilingual.source: Don't eat things with too much salt in them.
bilingual.target: 不要吃含盐太多的东西。

bilingual.source: Look at the man spreading salt on his doorstep.
bilingual.target: 看看那个在门口撒盐的人。

list.abstract: 盐是指一类金属离子或铵根离子（NH₄+）与酸根离子结合的化合物，如硫酸钙、氯化铜。 一般来说盐是复分解反应的生成物，也有其他的反应可生成盐，例如置换反应等。在标准状况下，不可溶的盐是固态，但也有例外，如熔盐（molten salt）及离子液体，可溶盐的溶液及熔盐有导电性，因此可作电解质。
salt是一个英语单词，可以用作名词、及物动词和形容词，可以翻译为盐、风趣，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you pass the salt, please? Sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 能把盐给我吗？谢谢。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course I like the smell. It's salt and fat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当然喜欢那味道啊。就是盐巴跟油脂。

yingyinNormal.en: For this I'm using crushed pink peppercorns and a pinch of salt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这需要用到红胡椒面和少许盐。

yingyinNormal.en: Finally, some white and black pepper and a pinch of salt. Now mix that up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后，再加入一些黑白胡椒粉和少许盐，把它们搅拌均匀。

yingyinNormal.en: Interesting. All right. Well, I'll go out with her again and I'll try to get past it. No salt. Bloat-y.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真有趣。好吧，我会再跟她出去，然后忘了过去。不吃盐！会胀气！

yingyinNormal.en: I am making hardtack, boiled salt pork, and because it's a special day, a chewable gob of tree sap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要做压缩饼干，盐煮猪肉，因为是特殊的日子，还要做可嚼式树汁块。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm gonna show you how to use flour, yeast, salt, olive oil and water and turn it into something truly magical.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我将教你怎样把面粉，酵母，盐橄榄油和水变成一种很神奇的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: "Go coach, go Dolphins!" I don't know. It seems a little "Go" heavy. Pink salt? What is wrong with people?
yingyinNormal.zh: 教练加油，海豚队加油！看上去"加油"加得有点过。粉红盐？人们现在都是什么毛病？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Salt, so your life always has flavor. Bread, so you never go hungry. And a scented candle for the bathroom, because well, you know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 盐，让你的生活有味；面包，让你永不饥饿；浴室用香精蜡烛，不用我说，你知道的。

yingyinNormal.en: Enrico's wife said the best way of cooking the fish is frying it, so we've seasoned it, little bit of salt, little bit of pepper, looking pretty good, to be honest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恩里克的妻子说做鱼的最好方式是煎，我们已经弄熟了，放点盐，加点胡椒，说真的，看上去很不错 。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Little bit of salt. You might think it's going to destroy your taste buds, you know, because of the numbing heat of it, but when you taste it, it's really quite subtle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加一点盐。你也许会想这道菜加了麻辣味，我的味蕾要被摧毁了，但你尝了就会知道，它没那么重口味。

yingyinNormal.en: Dried potatoes, vegetable oil, corn flower, wheat starch, maltodextrin, salt, and my favorite ingredient of all, uniformity. The uterus quivers, does it not?
yingyinNormal.zh: 干土豆，植物油，玉米，小麦淀粉，麦芽糊精，盐，还有我最喜欢的材料“一致性"。娇躯一喘，子宫一颤啊，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Thought I'd give the little woman a tour of the old salt mines.
yingyinNormal.zh: 带这位小美人逛逛这老盐矿。

yingyinNormal.en: He doesn't mean salt mines. He means where he works. Yeah, no, I got it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说的不是盐矿，他说的是工作地点。对，我知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Although it is dehydrated, once liquid hits it, it becomes alive and you don't want to restrict its movements by adding salt to it. Keep the salt away at this stage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽管现在是脱水的，一旦有水水就会复苏，所以不要加上食盐让它失效，把食盐放在另一边。

yingyinNormal.en: For example: A hair dryer, no, no, no. But shampoos and conditioners, yes, yes, yes. Now, the salt shaker is off limits. But the salt, I wish I'd thought this through.
yingyinNormal.zh: 例如，吹风机，不不不。但是洗发精跟润发乳，可以可以。盐巴罐是不行的，但是盐巴，我希望我刚刚有想清楚点。

yingyinNormal.en: Only a little bit. You don't want this to rise high. Finally, salt, and cold water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一点就可以，不然就会变得很大，最后加入食盐，凉水。

yingyinNormal.en: The minced prawns are bound together with salt, powdered chicken stock, potato flour and ground white pepper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 剁碎的虾仁加盐、鸡汤粉、土豆粉和白胡椒粉拌在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: If a doctor comes to you and inject you with ceiling water, water with some salt, you will experience painless.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果医生过来给你打一针盐水你一点也不痛苦。

yingyinNormal.en: Also, got these great salt and pepper shakers from the restaurant. That's not cool. Dude, none of this is cool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，我从餐厅里拿了这些盐巴胡椒罐。这不好。兄弟，这一切都不好。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 含盐的; 用盐腌的; 盐; 加盐; 用盐调味

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Just make sure you're getting real food without tons of added <highlight>salt</highlight> or sugar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要确保你吃的是没有大量添加盐或糖的真正的食物。

examination_example.sentence: As a result, <highlight>salt</highlight> protects food and many other things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，盐可以保护食物和许多其他东西。

examination_example.sentence: For centuries, <highlight>salt</highlight> was also hard to get.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几个世纪以来，盐也很难得到。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Salt</highlight> could even be used like money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 盐甚至可以像钱一样使用。
